General.Name: LI Ming Development Construction Co Ltd
General.Description: Li Ming Development Construction Co., Ltd. engages in the real estate development business in Taiwan. The company builds houses; and rents and sells buildings. The company was formerly known as M.E.T. Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Li Ming Development Construction Co., Ltd. in January 2007. Li Ming Development Construction Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1977 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 419, Gongdao 5th Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30069
